job.title: Driver
job.description:
UPS is accepting applications for full-time Warehouse Delivery Drivers. This is a physical, fast-paced, outdoor position that involves continual lifting, lowering and carrying packages that typically weigh 25 - 35 lbs. and may weigh up to 70 lbs. A DOT physical exam is required. Warehouse Delivery Drivers must have excellent customer contact and driving skills. A minimum number of UPS facilities may require the ability to drive a delivery vehicle with a standard (manual) transmission. Qualified applicants must have a valid driver’s license issued in the state that they live in. Warehouse Delivery Drivers are expected to comply with UPS appearance gDIUelines and wear the company-provided uniform.
Full-time UPS employees work eight or more hours per day and workdays can vary (Tuesday - Saturday) or (Wednesday - Sunday) depending on the building needs. There is typically no available work on Monday’s for this position. Some work in the warehouse may be required.
What's in it for you?
Excellent weekly pay Safe work environment 401(k) Medical, dental and vision after waiting period And so much more This job posting includes information about the minimum qualifications (including the UPS Uniform and Personal Appearance GDIUelines), locations, shifts, and operations within the locations which may consider my application. An applicant or employee may request an exception or change to, or an accommodation of, any condition of employment (including the UPS Uniform and Personal Appearance GDIUelines) because of a sincerely held religious belief or practice.
UPS is an equal opportunity employer. UPS does not discriminate on the basis of race/color/religion/sex/national origin/veteran/disability/age/sexual orientation/gender identity or any other characteristic protected by law

requirements.requirement1: Are you comfortable making multiple deliveries
requirements.requirement2: Are you comfortable lifting 50 lbs or more
